chatbot.title: Scheme Assistant
chatbot.helpMessage:
I can help you with:

• **Finding schemes** - Just type a keyword
• **Eligibility** - Ask about requirements
• **Documents** - What papers you need
• **How to apply** - Step by step guide
• **Dashboard help** - Using your account

Try asking something like 'PM Kisan' or 'agriculture schemes'!

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about Scheme Hub and our mission to connect citizens with government schemes
about.introDesc: Scheme Hub is a comprehensive digital platform that serves as a single-window access point for all Central and State Government schemes in India. Our platform is designed to make it easier for citizens to discover, understand, and apply for various government welfare programs.
about.missionDesc: To bridge the gap between government welfare schemes and eligible citizens by providing a user-friendly, accessible, and comprehensive platform.
about.visionDesc: To ensure that every eligible Indian citizen can easily access and benefit from government welfare schemes, regardless of their location or digital literacy.
about.objectiveDesc: To simplify the process of finding and applying for government schemes through intelligent eligibility matching and streamlined application procedures.
about.initiativeDesc: Scheme Hub is an initiative under Digital India to promote e-governance and provide citizen-centric services through a unified platform.
about.highlight1: Comprehensive database of Central and State Government schemes
about.highlight2: Smart eligibility checker to find schemes matching your profile

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help you find the right government schemes
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond to your query soon.
contact.addressContent: Scheme Hub Office, Government Complex, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
contact.mapPlaceholder: Map location will be displayed here

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about government schemes and how to use Scheme Hub
faq.a1: Scheme Hub is a comprehensive digital platform that provides information about Central and State Government schemes in India. It helps citizens discover, understand, and apply for various welfare programs.
faq.q2: Is Scheme Hub an official government website?
faq.a2: Scheme Hub is an information portal that aggregates data from official government sources. For authoritative information and actual applications, we redirect users to the respective official ministry or department websites.
faq.q3: Is Scheme Hub free to use?
faq.a3: Yes, Scheme Hub is completely free to use. You can browse schemes, check eligibility, and access all features without any charges.
faq.q4: How does the eligibility checker work?
faq.a4: Our eligibility checker uses the information you provide (age, income, state, category, etc.) to match you with schemes whose criteria you potentially meet. It's a guidance tool - final eligibility is determined by the concerned authorities.
faq.q5: Why am I not eligible for any schemes?
faq.a5: Eligibility depends on various factors like age, income, location, and category. Try adjusting your profile information or browse all schemes to find ones that might suit your situation.
faq.q6: Can I apply for schemes from other states?
faq.a6: Most state schemes are only for residents of that state. However, central government schemes are available to eligible citizens across India regardless of their state of residence.
faq.q7: How do I apply for a scheme?
faq.a7: When you click 'Apply Now' on a scheme page, you'll be redirected to the official application portal. Scheme Hub provides information and guidance but doesn't process applications directly.
faq.a8: Common documents include Aadhaar card, income certificate, caste certificate, residence proof, and bank details. Each scheme has specific requirements listed on its detail page.
faq.q9: How long does scheme approval take?
faq.a9: Processing time varies by scheme and department. It can range from a few weeks to several months. Check the official scheme portal for status updates after applying.
faq.q10: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a10: Creating an account is optional but recommended. It allows you to save schemes, store documents securely, and track your eligibility profile for personalized recommendations.
faq.a11: Documents you upload are stored locally in your browser. They are not uploaded to any external server. This means you'll need to re-upload if you use a different device.
faq.q12: How do I update my profile information?
faq.a12: Log in to your account and go to the Dashboard. Click on the 'Profile' tab to view and edit your personal information.
faq.contactPrompt: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.subtitle: Our commitment to making Scheme Hub accessible to everyone
accessibility.commitmentDesc: Scheme Hub is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We continuously improve the user experience for everyone and apply the relevant accessibility standards.
accessibility.screenReaderDesc: Full compatibility with popular screen readers for visually impaired users
accessibility.keyboardDesc: Complete website navigation possible using keyboard only
accessibility.contrastDesc: Sufficient color contrast for better readability
accessibility.audioDesc: Important information available in audio format
accessibility.navigationDesc: Clear and consistent navigation throughout the website
accessibility.responsiveDesc: Optimized for all devices including mobile and tablets
accessibility.standardsDesc: Scheme Hub strives to conform to the following accessibility standards:
accessibility.standard1: Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA
accessibility.feedbackDesc: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of this website. If you encounter any barriers, please contact us.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Important information regarding the use of Scheme Hub
disclaimer.introDesc: The information provided on Scheme Hub is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information up-to-date and accurate, we make no representations or warranties of any kind about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, or availability of the information.
disclaimer.generalDesc: Scheme details, eligibility criteria, and application processes are sourced from official government websites and may change without prior notice.
disclaimer.accuracyDesc: We do not guarantee that the eligibility checker results are accurate or that you will qualify for any scheme. Final eligibility is determined by the respective government authorities.
disclaimer.liabilityDesc: Scheme Hub shall not be liable for any loss or damage arising from the use of information provided on this platform.
disclaimer.legalDesc: This platform does not replace official government portals. For authoritative information, please visit the respective ministry or department websites.
disclaimer.note1: All scheme information is subject to change without prior notice. Always verify from official sources before applying.
disclaimer.note2: Scheme Hub does not process applications. We only provide information and redirect to official portals.
disclaimer.note3: User-uploaded documents are stored locally and are not shared with any third party.
disclaimer.note4: Any reliance you place on information from this website is strictly at your own risk.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using Scheme Hub
terms.introDesc: By accessing and using Scheme Hub, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the platform.
terms.acceptanceDesc: By using this website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.
terms.useDesc: You may use Scheme Hub for personal, non-commercial purposes to access information about government schemes. Any unauthorized use is prohibited.
terms.privacyDesc: Your use of Scheme Hub is also governed by our privacy practices. We respect your privacy and protect your personal information.
terms.intellectualDesc: All content, design, and functionality of Scheme Hub is protected by intellectual property rights. Unauthorized copying or distribution is prohibited.
terms.limitationsDesc: Scheme Hub provides information only and is not responsible for decisions made based on this information. Official government sources should be consulted.
terms.governingDesc: These terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Indian courts.
terms.obligation1: Provide accurate information when using the eligibility checker or creating an account.
terms.obligation2: Do not attempt to access, tamper with, or use non-public areas of the platform.
terms.obligation3: Do not use the platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms.obligation4: Respect the intellectual property rights and do not copy or redistribute content without permission.
terms.questionsDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us through the official channels.
